nodes.text: Pergola's Bridge was a man-made bridge constructed by the Naboo as a crossing point of one of the Solleu River.

Built by the Naboo, Pergola's Bridge was located on the Solleu River near some waterfalls that crested over the cliffs of Theed. A flat bridge, the crossing was built to ease the foot traffic over the ancient Bassa Bridge, which had begun to crumble from excessive use.
